What's the main focus of the new Verus Desktop release, which is apparently all about mobile mining?

The main focus of the new Verus Desktop release is not about mobile mining. Instead, it's about revamping the Multiverse-tab to provide better insights into blockchain economics and easier searches for currencies, as well as adding a testnet visualization feature to visualize the connections between blockchains, bridges, and currencies.

New Verus Desktop Features
In the upcoming new Verus Desktop release, the Multiverse-tab has been revamped and you’ll be able to get insights into the blockchain economics and easier ways to search for currencies.
Testnet visualization.
Another added feature is that you can visualize the network to see the connections between all the blockchains, bridges and currencies.
